H0.text: Chemical energy is ultimately produced by the mechanical vibrations in a doorbell circuit that converts electrical energy into mechanical energy.

H1.text: Thermal energy is produced by the vibrations of the mechanical energy generated by a doorbell circuit that converts electrical energy into mechanical energy.

H2.text: Radiant energy is ultimately produced by the mechanical vibrations generated by a doorbell circuit that converts electrical energy into mechanical energy.

H3.text: Sound energy is ultimately produced by the mechanical vibrations generated when a doorbell circuit converts electrical energy into mechanical energy.

A6.text: In physics, sound is a vibration that propagates as an acoustic wave through a transmission medium such as a gas, liquid or solid.
